summary.para: Specifies the deinterlacing video processor capabilities.
The video processor can perform bob deinterlacing. In bob deinterlacing, missing field lines are interpolated from the lines above and below. Bob deinterlacing does not require reference frames.

The video processor can perform a custom high-quality deinterlacing, which requires the number of reference frames indicated in PastFrames and FutureFrames output fields of the populated by a call to when the feature specified is . If the video processor doesn’t have the necessary number of reference frames, it falls back to bob deinterlacing.
